channel.title: Logging problem
channel.description:
As I searched a bit more i found out that this game was banned on turkey, no turkish ppl can play it. anyone has any idea about why? -.- its sad
Anyone has any ideas about that what the heck is this error that i used to get years ago and still getting -.-
(its 4.x error)
Exception in thread "Thread-25" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space at Class33.method412(Class33.java:56) at Stream.<init>(Stream.java:179) at Class44.method488(Class44.java:296) at client.method39(client.java:705) at client.method33(client.java:727) at Applet_Sub1.method30(Applet_Sub1.java:467) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:134) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
and thanks.. btw: i checked whole forum about it and nothing btw2: in 3.2 i get "Sorry, an error has occured whilst loading Runescape" error.

item.title: Logging problem
item.dc:creator: @zahit102 zahit102
item.description:
@zahit102 wrote:

It is just an error that i take when i enter Moparscape servers i mean those private servers. i mean the entering phase anyways lemme take a ss http://img694.imageshack.us/i/ekranalntscp.png/ ok it happens after 3 seconds of opening the website of the game (or windows client) then i cannot click anything the screen doesnt work etc. but sound still comes and i cannot play

As I searched a bit more i found out that this game was banned on turkey, no turkish ppl can play it. anyone has any idea about why? -.- its sad

Read full topic

No, its all moparscape private servers and basic moparisthebest.com thingie so im having this problem at loading and i couldnt find any technical problems section so i wrote it in server problems section if u want i can take a ss of whats happenin

What…

item.title: Logging problem
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

zahit102:

ok, im in wrong section sorry

If you’re talking about actual runescape, go to there forums and a Jagex Moderator will assist you. Thought I do believe the JVM doesn’t have enought memory to use to run the Java application.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

zahit102:

what do you mean?

Well, this is in server help so I’m going to assume it’s a server. Paste your run.bat code here.

item.title: Logging problem
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’m pretty sure it’s something to do with the amount of resources you’ve set Java to be able to use, though don’t quote me on that as I’ve never had it. I think the JVM needs you to set it more RAM etc (xmx512 etc).

Read full topic

As I searched a bit more i found out that this game was banned on turkey, no turkish ppl can play it. anyone has any idea about why? -.- its sad
